text: Ara yara dharmabhiruta abalanbana kareche tadera bala habe -- ''ki seti ya tomadera prabhu abatarana karechilena?’’ Tara balabe -- ''mahakalyana.’’ Yara bhala kaja kare tadera jan'ya e'i duniyate'i rayeche mangala, ara parakalera barighara ati uttama. Ara dharmaparayanadera abasasthala kato utkrsta
